gradeDescription: C = I needed a little help from the trainer.
whatIDidToday: played with as many buddies as possible
noteworthyComments:
Today I wanted to play with my friends all day. I didn’t always listen when they asked for a break and I was would bark at my friends while they were trying to nap. The staff would walk me on their belt and I was good with the leash but generally returned to whichever dog I was playing with before after being released. 
I did pretty good with the focus exercise today; for today’s focus exercise we had a Winter Olympics and ran through a tunnel, I was hesitant about going through the tunnel and only took a few steps but I tried my best.
